section.heading: Inapplicability to foreign transaction.
section.text: This chapter does not apply to property held, due, and owing in a foreign country if the transaction out of which the property arose was a foreign transaction.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 7003 of Fiscal Year 2022 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-159, Aug. 23, 2021, 68 DCR 008602).
